name: Spurte
description: Spurte is frontend tooling designed to meet the needs of Dart and Flutter Developers

name: Pheasant
description: A modern, progressive web framework implemented in the Dart that gets the job done

name: Scud
description: Scud is a cross-language meta build system used for generating build files for building single-language and multi-language projects (C/C++, D, Swift, Golang, Rust, Zig supported). Comes with a suite of tools for modern day development in low level languages including graphing dependencies.
